name: Flights of Fancy (kirkwinner)
description:
Controls:

Left and right: Walk on the menu screen / rotate when gliding
Up: Open umbrella
Space: Confirm on menu screen / Boost when gliding

Flights of Fancy is a side scrolling gliding action game. It was made as our 2014 end of year project.

Take control of Fancy the Fantastic as he performs on stage in front of a live audience. Follow his theatrics throughout the performance and experience new and interesting challenges as you go! Entertain the crowd by performing death defying loops and flips and watch your magic scarf grow!

Designer and Artist: James King
Designer and Artist: Jenna Smith
Designer and Programmer: Kirk Winner
